value.title: Bring your own container to project model accuracy drift with Amazon SageMaker Model Monitor
value.excerpt: The world we live in is constantly changing, and so is the data that is collected to build models. One of the problems that is often seen in production environments is that the deployed model doesn’t behave the same way as it did during the training phase. This concept is generally called data drift
